articles.author: India Today News Desk
articles.title: 'PM's presence in Indian team's dressing room reflects...': BJP's Rivaba Jadeja - India Today
articles.description: Rivaba Jadeja, a BJP MLA and the wife of cricketer Ravindra Jadeja, said PM Narendra Modi's presence in the Indian team's dressing room after their loss to Australia in the World Cup final reflected his compassionate statesmanship.
articles.content: BJP MLA and cricketer Ravindra Jadeja's wife Rivaba Jadeja has praised Prime Minister Narendra Modi after he visited the dressing room of Team India to console and lift the morale of the players foll… [+1596 chars]
